channel.title: Being able to use different client
channel.description:
Hey I was wondering is there any way to make it so you're able to use a different client for a source? because when ever I try to login with a different client I get disconnected
Thanks

item.title: Being able to use different client
item.dc:creator: @Dopple1 Dopple™
item.description:
@Dopple1 wrote:

Go into the server.ini file if your server has one and It says clientRequired:(A number)
Change the number on the clientRequired to 0 but if its at 0 leave it.
Or search the client.java for the UID

Read full topic
item.source: Being able to use different client

item.title: Being able to use different client
item.description:
@11167 wrote:

If you’re getting a different return code, then your server checks for the UID of the client (hint, take out that if statement).

Read full topic
item.source: Being able to use different client

item.title: Being able to use different client
item.dc:creator: @karl1 karl`
item.description:
@karl1 wrote:

change the item ids for the server to the one’s in the client

Read full topic
